##### Download AOP products

Download Airborne Observation Platform (AOP) data, which can be found in Step 1 by filtering for AOP. A product ID from step 1 or the NEON <a href='http://data.neonscience.org/static/browse.html' target='_blank'>data portal</a> is required. Due to the nature of remote sensing data, this make take a very long timeâ€” make sure to check download size beforehand.

Due to complications with `R Shiny`'s download system, two buttons were necesary; However, only the `Download items` button needs to be clicked, as the rest is done automatically.
